summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5974 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 26, 27, 28 and 29, Woodlawn Addition to Green Lake, being the alley between 4th Avenue Northeast and Maple Leaf Place from Woodlawn Avenue to the northeasterly line of Block 29, said Addition; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 79954 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
